title.value: Определение основных биохимических свойств микобактерий туберкулеза, выделенных из туберкулинов ППД, для млекопитающих
Definition of the basic biochemical properties of tuberculosis mykobacteria, allocated from tuberculines PPD, for mammals
Definition of the basic biochemical properties of tuberculosis mykobacteria, allocated from tuberculines PPD, for mammals

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Vlasenko, V.V., Vinnitsa Agrarian Technical University (Ukraine)
Lysenko, A.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies into the identification of the causative agent of tuberculosis in tuberculin and study the biochemical properties of mycobacteria isolated on a new test medium, which is recommended for quality control of tuberculins used in human and veterinary medicine. Testing nutrient medium possesses ability to stimulate biochemical processes in cells of mykobacteria, which enables to receive mykobacteria growth with lowered fermented activity (ability to live). Presence at a new nutrient medium of stimulation properties of fermented activity allows accelerating reception of laboratory analyses results for diagnostics of a tuberculosis.
